item.description: Biography Ph.D. student at Institute of Information Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences, studying computer science, focusing on machine learning for natural language. As a young researcher, your interest and kind citation (star) will definitely mean a lot for me and my collaborators. Education Sep. 2017 - Jul. 2022 (Expected) Institute of Information Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, China Ph.D. in Computer Science Jan. 2017 - Jul. 2017 STIC/OSM Laboratory, École Nationale Supérieure de Techniques Avancées de Bretagne, Brest, France Study Abroad Funded by CSC Jul.
